sub_title: Documentary Film Producer at Sound Pictures
summary:
I run my own production house, Sound Pictures along with my elder brother, Arun Bhattarai. We specialize in creative documentary.

I Graduated from Leiden University, the Netherlands, in the field of Business & Management in 2017 for which I was awarded a full Netherlands Fellowship Programme (NFP) scholarship by the Dutch government. 

I am currently working as a producer for my first feature length film Lily. Lily has been awarded the IDFA Bertha Fund Classic, 2018. I have worked as a production manager for Kelden, a feature length documentary supported by the Asia Pitch. I am also taking care of the distribution of, The Next Guardian (a feature length documentary that featured in IDFA, 2017 under first appearance competition) in Bhutan.

awards.title: Netherlands Fellowship Programmes
awards.description: I am a recipient of the prestigious Netherlands Fellowship Programme (NFP)  award from the Dutch Government to study a two year masters programme at Leiden University, The Netherlands.

projects.title: Official Websites Development (www.rtc.bt and my.rtc.bt) - Royal Thimphu College
projects.description:
As an IT officer I volunteered to re-develop the college official website(www.rtc.bt). 
Without any prior experience in web development I had to learn from the beginning including the WMS platform Joomla. I was able to successfully learn, develop, present, migrate and deploy the new website.

After few months, I again took up the responsibility to re-develop the intranet site (my.rtc.bt). 
I was able to develop the intranet site and successfully deploy it. I also integrated the authentication server and the college information management system into the intranet site.

My supervisor Dr. Samir Patel was instrumental in providing the right guidance, support and instructions through out both of these tasks.

After its deployment, these website's were used a lot more effectively as the main platform for official announcements, advertisements, marketing and other important information dissemination. 

I also was appointed the webmaster and was responsible for their updates, maintenance and providing timely reports of webpage visitors.

contributors.headline: Documentary Film Producer at Sound Pictures

company.name: Royal Thimphu College (Royal University of Bhutan)

profile_positions.company: Royal Thimphu College (Royal University of Bhutan)
profile_positions.description:
Company Info: Royal Thimphu College is the first private college in Bhutan. It was inaugurated in 2009 and has already established itself as an exemplary institution in the country with an A+ accreditation . 

Responsibility: Overall  administration of the IT infrastructure and services. 

One of my important responsibility and contribution was in researching and implementing new IT applications, tools and services to strengthen the IT infrastructure according to the institutes growing requirements and demand.

As a webmaster, I was responsible for developing, maintaining and upgrading the website and related applications for the institute. I developed the college's official website and its intranet site and administered them. I also developed a web-based maintenance management system for the estate department.

I was involved in  setting up and administering  various IT servers and the IT network in the college.
I also officiated as the IT manager several times and lead my colleagues as a team leader during different IT team tasks and projects. I represented the IT department in different sub-committees on various occasions, conferences and events, overlooking smooth IT support services during these  events. 

I also served as the college music club coordinator and along with the club members we organised and held several musical events in the institute.
profile_positions.title: IT Officer

profile_positions.description:
Company Info: Tashi infocomm is the first and only private among the 2 telecommunication and internet service providers in Bhutan. Its growth has been steady and it enjoys a very competitive market position in the country. 

Responsibility: Set up and maintenance of the ISP Network of the company

As a Network Engineer my primary responsibility was to setup client-side leased-line network connections. This included visiting potential clients with the marketing team and determining the feasibility according to the clients location and requirements. This followed with the responsibility of managing the  installation and configuration of the network devices at the required site. I also monitored these connections and was responsible for providing continued support and maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Network Engineer
